inn1.comm: length delivery just outside off, he leans forward and blocks it
walks across to the off side and pushes the length delivery into the covers as it shapes away
waits for it this time to come to him outside off and helps it to point
short of length and much wider outside off, he lets it go this time
comes across to off again and pushes the straighter delivery to mid-on this time
futile appeal as the ball hits Azhar well outside off as he looked to drive, Mathews starts with a maiden
widish length delivery outside off, left alone
pitched up with room and Shehzad drives that beautifully but straight to cover
145kph, offcutter pitched up outside off, driven straight to point this time
slightly full and still outside off, pushed down to mid-off
142.3kph, angles it in towards off stump now, Shehzad stays back and pushes to mid-off again
beautiful delivery for another maiden, touch short of length and angled in a bit just outside off, Shehzad was stuck to his crease as he poked and missed
another appeal turned down as he was struck well outside off again while looking to drive
pitched up slightly, he drives it confidently this time
stays back and punches the back of length delivery to cover point
angling in from back of length towards the leg side, he looks to glance and is struck on the pads
gingerly defends the striaghtish delivery towards midwicket and runs quickly. Tharanga picks it up but doesn't release it properly
towards off stump, clipped to midwicket and just one from this one
punched off the front foot, what an unusual shot as he takes a step forward and kind of drives the back of length ball between mid-off and cover
beaten! This one swings in, keeps low from length just outside off as Azhar goes hard with a drive but the ball finds the gap between bat and pad
pitched up slightly and it's pushed down to mid-on
rolls his fingers over this one as it comes in, flicked to deep square leg for two
good-looking punch down the ground with an absolutely straight bat, mid-on runs to his left but the ball goes through his legs to give them three
overpitched outside off, driven handsomely towards mid-off for a quick single
squares his up with the incoming delivery, he looked to play it on the leg side but it held its line a bit, thick edge went towards cover point
wider outside the off stump on length, left alone
better-looking drive off the front foot, straight to point
stays back and punches this length delivery on the off side, slight fumble at cover point gives them one
Mathews appeals for lbw as this one came in towards leg, he was struck in front of leg as it deflected down the leg side for a leg bye
straighter one just outside off, pushed down towards mid on with soft hands for a quick single
almost in the block hole outside off, he drives late to point and they decide against the single
full and outside off, driven firmly into the covers and Tharanga dives to his right at short cover to stop with one hand
no footwork at all as the ball nips in from back of length, he stays stuck and looks in two minds and lets it go through the gap between bat and pad
guides the wider delivery outside off this time to third man for two
fullish on the off stump, flicked nicely to the leg side and well fielded by the midwicket fielder

touch short of length outside off, it's punched to cover point. Oh, but a direct hit at the non-striker's end leads to four overthrows. It's gone to the third umpire to check if the batsman was in. Looks like he got his bat down just in time, didn't drag it
bit of extra bounce as it nips in, Azhar defends it back just in time
touch wider outside off, he leans forward and defends confidently
length delivery outside the off stump, pushed down to mid-off this time
back of length and wider outside off, helped to point
touch fuller but much wider, he opens his arms and drives square, straight to backward point
on length and outside off again, he helps it to backward point again
146.8kph, loud appeal for lbw as the ball swings in sharply, hits Shehzad on the back foot after pitching just outside off, and hit him on the thigh pad in front of leg. Good decision
drives firmly to point this time and Dilshan flies to his right from backward point to stop, save and throw it back in no time
towards the pads, not too short or full, but it's clipped away nicely off the pads pretty wide of midwicket for four
finds the fielder this time as he flicks to midwicket this time
134.6kph, rolls his fingers over this one, pitches it well outside off and Azhar drives it to cover
looks to drive outside off again, pretty wide outside off and is struck on the pad well outside
pretty accurate delivery on the off stump, defends off the back foot
touch shorter outside off, it's punched off the back foot to extra cover
comes down the track for the widish delivery outside off, he drives and gets a thick outside edge to third man
gets an inside edge onto the pads while looking to push it to cover
goes hard down the ground and gets four! It was pitched up slightly, he lofted it down the ground even though didn't get the middle but hit it wide and over mid-on
leans forward and helps the length delivery towards point this time
doesn't time it properly as he drove off the front foot into the covers, the top hand came off towards the end and he just managed to beat cover and extra cover
pushes the length deliver into the covers again, to the fielder this time
comes down the track, Perera pitches it short just outside off and Shehzad pulls it wide of midwicket for four more
back of length outside off, cuts it late and square to backward point
slogs by coming down, gets a thick edge to short midwicket
short ball towards the leg side, that's a poor delivery and Shehzad pivots on the back foot to pull that late and wide of short fine leg for four. 12 runs from that over
nearly carries to short cover as this one on off stump squared him up a bit, the ball went in the air towards the fielder but he misfielded too
on the leg side, clipped away easily to fine leg
helps the back of length ball to backward point. That's a no ball for overstepping
opens up his stance, Malinga bowls an outswinger well outside off, just inside the line and he misses it
short ball on the stumps, pulled to deep square leg for one
back of length and swinging away, he guides it to backward point
closer to the off stump and he runs it down to third man for one
low full toss on the stumps, pushed down to long on for one
goes deep in the crease and tucks the ball from outside off to leg for one
flighted just outside off, he goes for a big drive and gets an inside edge to backward square leg for one
closer to off and it's pushed back to the bowler
comes down and pushes it to long off this time
pitched up and driven down to long off for one
slightly back of length outside off, defends it back
touch shorter and it's swatted to deep square leg for one
length delivery outside off, pushed into the covers
fuller on off and it's flicked to deep midwicket for one
attempted yorker is a swinging and low full toss on middle and leg, inside edge and off the pad to fine leg for one
slower offcutter outside off, driven nicely to deep cover for one
on length on middle, he comes down and turns it to long-on for one
he comes down too, makes it a full toss and whips it straight to midwicket
stays in this time to defend the ball back
goes for a big drive outside off, mistimes it to short cover

the first breakthrough and Pathirana gets his first international wicket! It was tossed up outside off, Shehzad went for a big slog sweep against the line and got an inside edge onto his stumps. The intention was there throughout the over and three dot balls did it
short of length outside off, cuts it off the back foot to point
angled in towards middle and leg, helped off the pads to deep backward square leg
angles it in towards off stump now, defended back to the bowler
129.4, slower bouncer by Pradeep's standards, it was just outside off and he swayed out of the line
another bouncer, Hafeez pulls awkwardly, nearly withdrawing his bat at the end and the edge fell well short of fine leg
on length on the off stump, pushed down towards mid-on for one
fullish outside off, driven down nicely to mid-off
slightly short outside off, cut off the back foot and a fumble at point gives them one
dances down the track to take it on the full and slams it straight down, with a kind of a whip and sends it for six over long off
stifled appeal for lbw as it pitches on middle and and leg and is going down leg
comes down and drives it along the ground to long off for one
full on the stumps, clipped to midwicket
comes down again, and a turns it to midwicket. He gets a hand to it but doesn't stop it
on length around off, pushed back to the bowler
wider outside off, he drives late and gets a thick edge to third man for one
back of length outside off and he defends it to cover now
angles in a bouncer and he ducks under it
short of length towards off, tucked to midwicket for one
short ball towards leg, flicked to fine leg after walking across, for one
on length on leg, swept against the turn to short fine leg for one
coming in towards middle stump, tucked to short midwicket off the back foot
leas forward and pushes the ball to cover
comes down, he pitches it short and wider, Hafeez is forced to check his shot and guides it to point

anther one for Pathirana, what a sharp catch at short cover! It was pitched up, Hafeez unleashed a powerful drive on the up but the captain catches it nicely with both hands around his chest with fingers pointing upwards. Big blow for Pakistan, big wicket for the debutant
presses forward to block the ball and is nearly hit on the pads in front of the stumps
short of length and moving away outside off, guides it square to deep point
outside the off stump and he defends it back
swinging away from well outside off, called a wide
more towards middle and leg now, Babar defends on the leg side
length delivery outside off, pushed down to mid-off
short of length towards middle and leg, clipped off the back foot to fine leg for one
slow and short down the leg side, maybe some edge on that as it bounces once before the keeper, not called a wide
bit of turn for the length delivery outside off, he presses forward and blocks
charges down and drives that straight to cover
much short on leg, he pivots on the back foot and slams that wide of deep midwicket for a powerful four
tossed up outside off, driven down to long off for one
comes down, gets an inside edge off the drive onto his pad and gets a quick single
short of length and turning away, he cuts that nicely off the back foot wide of deep point for two
135.5kmh, on middle on length, pushed down to mid-on for one
slow bouncer at 127kph, Babar ducks under it
another short ball, this one is pulled to in the air towards deep square leg for one
swinging delivery, almost a yorker on off, it's pushed down to mid-off for a quick single
short ball swinging away outside off, punched to point
short ball towards leg now, it's pulled straight to square leg
pretty accurate on off and middle, he leans forward and tucks the ball to square leg for a single
just misses the off stump! It was pitched up outside leg, he flicked but got an inside edge onto the pad and the ball then rolled towards the slips
driven firmly from off stump straight to cover
comes down the track and drives it back to the bowler, he stops with his left hand
fullish outside off, pushed back, was in the air for a bit
on leg stump and he tucks to square leg for one
yorker on the off stump, blocked on the off side by Azhar
full on the pads now, clipped deep midwicket for one

run out chance, it's a direct hit and the fielders seem confident as the decision goes up! Babar drove the ball to mid-off and took off for the single, the fielder at mid-off got a direct hit but Babar's dive saved him
gets a short ball and swats it to deep square leg for one
yorker on the off stump, he rolled his fingers over this one, and it's blocked back
121.8kph, slower offcutter well outside off, driven to deep cover for one
three in three for left-arm spinners! Pretty flat ball around off stump, Babar went back to cut it late but missed it and the ball went on to hit top of off stump
goes back for the flighted delivery on off stump and defends on the off side
comes down the track this time and takes it on the pad outside off
on middle stump now, pushed down to long on off the back foot
goes back and defends it to midwicket
length delivery outside off, it's pushed towards point and the pressure of stopping that run leads to a fumble
bit of flight as the ball comes in, it's pushed back to Dilshan
bit too short outside off, it's cut to deep point
comes down the track and drives it firmly to cover
bit short outside off and he cuts that past point for one
makes a lot of room but the ball follows him with the turn towards leg and he pushes it to cover
comes down this time and pushes the ball down to long on
towards the leg side now and it's clipped off the pads to deep square leg for one
tossed up on middle, it's slammed along the ground with a drive for one
errs towards middle and leg again, worked behind square on leg
scoops it with the turn to deep cover for one
fullish on middle and leg, pushed down to long on for one more
he comes down, the bowler pitches it wide and he somehow pushes it to cover
punches the ball back and Dilshan dives to his right to stop it, almost collides with the non-striker
keeps a bit low outside off as he pushes it back
turning in towards leg, clipped to deep midwicket for one
comes down the track and takes it on the pad outside off
length delivery on leg stump, helped to square leg
comes down to drive the ball to leg but gets an inside edge onto his pads
goes on the back foot and defends the ball to leg
fullish on the stumps and he drills it straight to midwicket
shortish outside off, it turns away and Shoaib cuts it late wide of short third man
comes down and defends the ball on the off side
fullish on middle and leg, turned to midwicket and they sneak in a quick single
makes room, the ball slides in and he somehow whacks it down to long on for one
lbw appeal as he reverse-sweeps and is hit on the glove, deflects for a single
comes down and pushes the ball down to long on

that balloons off the edge behind square on leg, Malinga runs in from short fine leg and takes the catch, but he himself looks unsure. It was a poor delivery turning down leg, Azhar pulled with a top edge, Malinga dived forward, tried to get his fingers under it and replays show the ball had hit the ground. Given not out after consulting the third umpire
tries to tuck the flatter delivery on leg but can't put it away
fuller on the pads, flicked easily to deep backward square leg
flat and short down leg for a wide
cuts the wider delivery from outside off, wide of point for two
comes down and pushes the ball towards deep cover
fuller on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
touch wider outside off and it's pushed into the cover
makes some room pretty early and whacks that with a big drive, inside out over the covers for four
fuller on middle, tucked against the spin to deep square leg or one and that's his fifty
fullish outside off, pushed straight to cover
short ball into the batsman, pulled late to fine leg for one
full on the pads, clipped to deep midwicket for one
full on the off stump, pushed down to mid on for a quick single
back of length outside off, cut late to third man for one
129.8kph, bouncer well over the batsman, called a wide
short ball again, towards the chest this time and he pulls to deep fine leg for one
mixes it up with a yorker, he defends it to midwicket
comes down and pushes the ball to long on
comes down the track to take it on the full and drives it straight over the bowlers head for a six
keeps a bit low as he goes on the back foot and swats it from outside off to deep midwicket
wider outside off and Azhar swishes at it nicely just past point for four
touch short of length outside off, he defends towards point with soft hands for a quick single
accurate delivery on middle stump, turned to deep midwicket for one
full outside off, pushed back to the bowler
full on middle now, driven down to mid-on this time and there's a fumble. But they decide against the single
another full delivery on middle, another push down towards mid-on and this time Shoaib calls early for a quick single
offcutter around off, he cuts it late to third man for one
bouncer towards middle and leg, he ducks under it
another short ball makes the batsman go back in the crease and on his toes to defend it
turning in towards the batsman, clipped to deep midwicket for one for the fifty partnership
goes back and pushes the ball down to long on for one
comes down and almost whips the ball, then defends to midwicket
makes a lot of room, the ball turns in and keeps a bit low, he cuts it to deep point for one
takes a step down and pushes the ball to long on for one
goes on the back foot for the shortish ball, it turns towards leg and he pulls it to deep backward square leg. There's a fielder there but it deflects off his hand for four
on length outside off, drives it late to point
gets room, and it's a touch shorter too, Shoaib cuts it square and just wide of point for a cracking four
more towards middle and leg now, defends to midwicket
short of length again outside off, he cuts it square again, in the air and it goes over and wide of point for four more
tries a yorker and it's a low full toss, clipped to deep midwicket for two
short ball outside off, Shoaib looks to ramp it over the keeper but misses
short of length outside off, cuts off the back foot to deep cover
sliding in towards off stump, he guides it dangerously to short third man
charges down to take the ball on the full and slams it over the bowler's head with a lofted straight drive for a clean six
short of length outside off, cuts off the back foot again on the off side
goes back and helps the ball from middle and leg to backward square leg
very poor delivery, it;'s a half-tracker on the stumps and Shoaib comes back to pivot and hammers it over the midwicket boundary for an even bigger six, that's his fifty. Time to get drinks too
seams this ball in towards middle stump, loud appeal for lbw as Azhar is trapped in front of middle stump and gets a leg bye. Probably the height saved him
errs down the leg side with a short ball for a wide
what a delivery, Shoaib looks flummoxed, completely beaten! It was quicker on the off stump and was angling in a bit, Shoaib played for that but the ball seamed away and knocked the off stump over
short on the leg side, pulls it a bit late to fine leg for one
another short ball towards leg, and pulled for one again
length delivery around off, pushed down to mid-off
slides it down the leg side just past the pads for a wide
pushes the fuller delivery outside off to cover
comes down and drives the ball into the covers. Both batsmen stopped halfway and then Azhar signalled to Rizwan almost saying: what are you waiting for?
pushes the length delivery from off to cover
tries to sweep the ball to leg but doesn't hit it, called wide
length delivery on leg stump, helped to short fine leg for one
bit too short outside off, Azhar makes room and cuts it late past short third man for four
drives the fuller delivery down to long off for one
angled in towards off and middle, clipped to deep midwicket for two more
works the length ball from around off on the off side, misfield at cover makes the single easier
fuller outside off, driven down to mid-off this time
angled into the pads and it's helped along to fine leg for one
slightly full on off stump, pushed down to mid-on
130kph, length delivery and it's pushed down gently to mid-on for a quick single
turning in towards the pads, clipped behind square on leg for one
short and flat on middle, pushed down to mid on

lofts it very very high on the leg side and gives an easy catch! It was pitched up on the stumps, he went down on a knee and lofted it between deep midwicket and long-on, deep midwicket  ran to his left to take it comfortably
outside off and it's pushed into the covers for a quick single
length delivery on the stumps, pushed down to long on
short ball angled in, he ducks under it
angled in further and it's worked to deep squre leg for one
pitched up outside off, superb drive through the covers, handsomely done, and Pradeep puts a half-hearted drive from deep cover and doesn't stop it
targets the stumps and clips the ball to midwicket for a quick single
fuller on the pads, clipped to deep fine leg for one
short ball, pulled, although mistimed, to deep midwicket and they manage to come back in time for the second
turning in towards middle, pushed down the ground for one
length delivery is helped to square leg for one
fullish delivery pushed down, Dilshan dives to his right to stop a few runs, or maybe only one
sweeps the ball from well outside off with the turn to deep fine leg for two
full delivery on the stumps, he still sweeps him to leg
middle-leg line now, swept again and it beats Tharanga at deep fine leg for four more

big appeal for lbw, the finger goes up, but he reviews it! It was almost a yorker on the leg stump, Sarfraz went back to clip it to leg, looks like the ball has pitched outside leg and is going down leg too, will be interesting to see where the impact is. Oh DRS, umpire's call for impact, umpire's call for just hitting the stump and it's out again
swinging yorker on the off stump, thick edge goes down to third man for one
bangs in the short ball, Rizwan pulls to deep backward square leg
slower ball, pretty full outside off, and it's left alone
full delivery towards mid-on for one, midwicket runs to his left but doesn't get a direct hit at the non-striker's end
almost a yorker and it's pushed down to long-on for one
short of length ball outside off, cuts it late to third man for one
short ball just outside off, he runs it down to third man for one
length delivery on the off stump, worked down to long-on this time
slower offcutter just outside off, pushed into the covers
falls just short of mid-off! It was a slower ball on the stumps, he mistimed it down the ground and leading edge fell just short
short of length outside off now, cuts it square to deep cover for one
low full toss on off and he drives that nicely into the gap between mid-off and cover for four
tries a yorker again and it's a low full toss, driven straight down the ground towards long-on for one
yorker on off, thick edge goes down to third man for one
121.5kph, slower full delivery outside off, it's steered straight to point
124.6kph, short ball with the angle, Rizwan looks to rampi while swaying out of the line and ducking, took his eyes off the ball too, and missed it
short ball down the leg side, he pulls and misses and it's called a wide
he bowls another bouncer, this one close to the batsman. He pulls and misses again
full on the pads, pushed down to long on for one
full on the middle stump, pushed to cover this time
full toss this time and it's slammed back to the bowler
full on middle and off, he makes room and drives inside out along the ground to deep cover for one

drives it over the covers again with the spin, long off runs to his left and manages to push the ball in with his left hand. The ball is still rolling towards the rope and then he kicks it in just before crossing the rope
charges down the track and slams the ball from well outside off, against the turn over long on for a big six. These two turning things on here
offcutter on middle and leg, tucked away off the pads to deep midwicket and they come back quickly for the second
errs way down the leg side for a wide
stifled appeal as Rizwan looks to pull the short ball down leg, but it's called a wide
absolutely full on the off stump, he whacks it back just over the bowlers' head and wide of mid-off for a powerful four
bang on target - yorker on the off stump and this time he has no choice but to block it back

another full delivery, maybe a bit slower, and Rizwan scoops it with the wrists well over the bowler's head, mid-off is in so long on runs to his left a long way but doesn't keep it in despite reaching here
maybe he expected the short ball, he stayed back and smacked that over the backward square leg boundary for a clean six. There was a fielder there be he couldn't do anything
another short ball, this one is pulled a bit wide of deep midwicket in the gap for two more
length delivery on off, pushed down gently towards mid-on and Mathews tumbles while running towards the ball and collides with the non-striker
chips the length ball down towards mid-on and they run back for the second as no fielder is close to the ball
straighter on off and middle, pushed back to the bowler
wider outside the off stump, he steers it straight to point but they want another one and make it in time
yorker on the off stump, Anwar had opened his stance after shuffling across, but he only found midwicket
attempted yorker is a low full toss on middle, clipped in the gap on the leg side, wide of long on and that's Rizwan's fifty
angling in towards leg stump, deflects off the back pad to the off side for a leg bye
touch short of length outside off, Rizwan swat-pulls it to square leg for one

that's gone very high, that's lost in the clouds, oh it's coming down and a tiny collision between Pradeep and Chandimal means the catch is dropped! Anwar flicked the full ball on the leg side but mistimed it completely, the ball went very very high near the pitch on the off side. Chandimal ran towards it, so did Pradeep but he should have left it for the keeper with the gloves
gets the wicket this time! Slower full ball on the stumps, Rizwan looked to almost sweep that, but it hits him right in front of middle and that is plumb
widish outside off, he runs it down to third man for one
back of length slower ball outside off, he waits for it and then opens the face of the bat late to run it down to the third-man boundary for four
full ball on the off side, he lofts it high on the leg side and it's an easy catch for Siriwardana at deep square leg
just outside off on length, he slogs and misses. The keeper also fumbles with the ball but they don't take a bye

dropped again even though it went very high again! Scrambled seam for the length delivery moving away from outside off, a wild slog leads to another leading edge that goes close to the stumps at bowler's end. The debutant runs in from the off side, dives and can't get there
charges down and slogs, misses the ball outside off
117.3kph, slower delivery outside the off stump, the batsman misses and it's called a wide
dropped, would you believe it! Anwar slammed this ball high on the off side, it was a short of length offcutter, the debutant peddaling back from cover but it went through his hands
charges down, swings his bat and gets a thick edge flying over short third man for four to end the innings

inn2.comm: loud appeal on the first ball for caught behind! It was a swinging delivery from back of length outside off,Kusal poked outside off without any footwork and missed. Keeper and bowler appealed as if it was out, but no review
shorter on off and similar line, Kusal throws his bat half-heartedly and it flew just over first slip for a four! The edge was thick enough
angled in this time, he helps it easily to fine leg for one
absolutely full outside off, swing and a miss. The sound was of bat hitting the ground
shortish on the leg side, he errs with the line again, and Dilshan tucks it fine on the leg side to beat fine leg for four
back of length towards middle and leg, Dilshan defends it close to himself
full delivery with room, Kusal swings his arms and connects this time, slammed over the covers for a cracking four!
touch back of length outside off, he cuts it straight to point
fullish on off, Kusal stays back and whips that away fearlessly behind square on the leg side for four more. What confidence!
bit too short as it angles in, he pivots on the back foot and swat-pulls it just wide of short fine leg for four. Irfan barely moved at that position
much straighter around the off stump, he defends it back this time
top edge for six! Short ball came in, Kusal went for the pull and only got a thick top edge and the ball flew to the fine leg boundary, into the stands for six!
good bounce as usual from Irfan, touch back of length outside off, Dilshan chased and missed
closer to off stump, Dilshan pushes and gets an inside edge on the leg side

length delivery on the off stump, pushed gently towards mid-off and Dilshan sets off early for the run. Oh, he's left his shoe less than halfway through the run, didn't even look back at it. Let bygones be bygones
slogged for four more, Rahat or Irfan, doesn't make a difference to Kusal. It was on length and coming in, he didn't move his feet much and dispatched it to the square leg boundary along the ground
short ball down the leg side this time for a wide
this short ball is towards the batsman, he gets on top of it and pulls to the midwicket boundary for four more through the aerial route
just outside off, Kusal throws his bat at it and gets a thick edge just over first slip for four more! Luck for Kusal, it wasn't too far from the keeper either

goes for four even though the fielder got a hand to it! Fullish outside off, there's room and Dilshan creams it along the ground through the covers. A diving Shehzad got his right hand to it but it wasn't enough
bit wider outside off, Dilshan helps it to point with the angle
outside off from length and he defends it back

bit of a mix up but they get the run. Dilshan pushed the ball from off stump towards midwicket and took a few steps, so did Kusal as the bowler ran to his right. They both eventually went for it as the ball wasn't coming towards the bowler
fullish outside off, swatted to the cow corner with utter disdain, he's not leaving this for the end! He dispatched it from outside off to the other side

what's happened to Kusal?! This was short of length towards off, he hardly moved and chipped it over the bowler's head with half a pull for four more. It didn't race away but had enough to beat any fielder
turning in towards middle, tucked away to deep midwicket for one. Dilshan leaves his shoe back again, this time right at the crease
sliding in towards leg, deflects off the pads for a leg bye
turning in, he steers it to square leg and is sent back by Kusal
full outside off, driven late to backward point for one as the fielder dives
towards leg and he sweeps that against the turn well wide of short fine leg for four
swept again, on length on the pads and he went down on the knee to sweep it to square leg boundary for his fifty
length delivery on off, keeps a bit low, and he defends it back
fullish outside off, he drives it to cover where the fielder Rizwan stops with his right hand and even gets a direct hit at the keeper's end. Dilshan wanta a run after that, but sent back again
on length just outside off, pushed back to Anwar
full on the pads and he clips it towards deep backward square leg for two in the gap
pushes the ball down to mid on and gets a quick single
crackalicious! Slightly full on the off stump and he smacks that to the square leg boundary. Flat six!!
turning in from just short of length, pushed down easily to long on for one
dances down, makes it a waist-high full toss and hammers that to the cow corner for a one-bounce four!

another one-bounce four, there's nobody in the deep! He came out of his crease again, Hafeez pitched it shorter outside off, Kusal still went for the slog-sweep and didn't middle it. But got the distance to get an easy four
dot ball! Goes back in the crease to push the length ball to midwicket this time
Kusal misses but the ball goes down leg past his pads for a wide
gently pushes the length ball from the back foot to midwicket for one
short of length towards middle and leg, worked down to long on off the back foot
length delivery around the off stump, pushed into the covers
fullish towards leg stump, steered to deep midwicket for one
on the pads on length, but there are fielders in the deep so he pushes it down to long-on along the ground for one
fullish outside off, he drives that into the covers for one
full toss on off stump, pushed down to mid-off for a quick single. Azhar fails to pick it up on first attempt
117kph, slower offcutter coming in from off and middle, helped towards midwicket for one
thick outside edge, Dilshan pushed at the length delivery outside off and got it towards third man for one. No problem if Kusal on strike
he's done it, gets the wicket of Kusal after being walloped around by him! It was short of length, Kusal swat-pulled that straight to Yasir Shah at the backward square leg boundary
it's coming in with the angle, and he helps it delicately to fine leg for two
back of length outside the off stump, Tharanga shoulders arms
on length, on the stumps, Tharanga defends it back
closer to off stump now, solid defence from Tharanga again
length delivery on off, tucked to square leg for one
good-length ball around off, punched straight to cover
right on target, unlike how they were bowling to Kusal, and Tharanga defends it back again
more towards middle and leg and he steers it to deep square leg for one this time
slower delivery on off, turned to deep square leg by Dilshan as well
short of length on the pads, he tucks it towards midwicket and Anwar himself runs to the ball to keep it to one
some room on the off side and Tharanga unleashes a cut and Babar dives to his right at point to save a few runs
137.8kph, accurate length delivery on middle and leg, steered to midwicket for one
tucks the ball with the angle to fine leg for one
short ball towards the waist, he pulls it straight to deep backward square for one
short ball hits him on the glove! Tharanga stayed back in the crease as the ball rose on him, he took evasive action while taking his eyes off the ball, but the ball kept rising and hit the gloves
135kph, ferocious bouncer around off, Tharanga manages to duck under it just in time. Words of encouragement from Sarfraz
appeal for lbw as the ball is sliding towards leg stump, down leg actually as Dilshan misses it and is struck just outside leg
drives the full ball from off down to long off for one
flatter on off, Tharanga goes back and punches to cover point but no time for a run
short of length well outside off, cuts it fiercely to deep cover for one
leans forward and pushes that to cover
fuller outside off and it's driven down to long off this time
turning into the batsman, helped with the turn behind square on leg for one
full on the off stump, drives it down just wide of long off for two
another drive outside off, straight to cover this time
sliding in with the angle from short of length towards middle, Tharanga goes back dangerously and cuts it late to guide it wide of short third man for four. Beautifully timed
on the back foot again, pushes it to cover now
leans towards the ball, straighter ball and thick edge rolls away to midwicket
goes on the front foot and drives with the turn into the covers
flight on the leg stump, Tharanga waits and helps it to midwicket
fullish outside off, drives away from the body to deep backward point for one
flighted on middle stump, Dilshan drives it off the front foot to cover
flighted full toss on off, driven back firmly and Yasir takes his hands off to let it go to long off
it's full, it's wide, it's four! He got room and swing his bat nicely to let it roll along the ground, through the covers for a beautiful four
bit of flight on off, worked down to long on for one
drives that with the turn straight to cover
chipped in the air down to long off for one
turning in towards middle and leg, pushed down to long on off the back foot
on leg, he goes back to work it to square leg
fullish on the off stump with some turn, driven down to long on for one more
slider on the middle stump, punched off the back foot to cover
bit of flight on middle and leg, he leans forward to block it
outside off this time and he drives it down to long off this time
quicker one just outside off, goes across and beats the outside edge edge
chips the ball back uppishly from middle stump, down to mid off for a quick single
fullish delivery this time and Dilshan slogs it to the cow corner for a four, right in the gap
angling in a little bit, Tharanga pushes it to the midwicket region for one
angling across outside off, he helps it to point off the back foot
back of length on middle and leg and coming in, no room for him to put it away so he defends it back
angles it across this time, tempts him with room, Dilshan chases and misses
length delivery on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket for one
short ball towards the batsman, he pulls to deep square leg for one
appeal for caught behind down the leg side as the ball turns past the pads. Umpire doesn't move so must have clipped the thigh pad
falls short of long-on! He comes down to take the ball on the full and lofts it down to long on, safely
quicker one outside off, cuts off the back foot to deep cover for one
goes in the crease as the ball turns in too, then chops the ball against the spin to deep point for one
drifting towards the pads and he clips it straight to square leg
short ball outside off, he waits for it and then ramps it over the slip region for four. One slip in place, it was far away from him
leans forward a bit tu push that into the covers

gone right through to knock the off stump! Movement off the pitch for Rahat as the ball pitched outside off, came in with the angle too as Tharanga didn't move his feet at all and let the ball go through the gap between bad and pad. Rahat pumps his fist
towards the pads and he tucks it nicely to fine leg for one
he just defends that one off the back foot to the deep midwicket fielder with soft hands and they have enough time to come back for the second. Excellent running!
defends the ball around off on the back foot towards cover
bit of turn outside off and it's pushed down to long off for one
goes on the back foot and chops it towards cover point for one
beats him with the turn! Length delivery on off, nice grip and turn as Mathews pokes and misses
touch fuller and it's pushed into the covers for one
even fuller to Dilshan and he steers it with the turn to deep point for one
pushes the ball into the covers and the fielder slides to his right to stop that
back of length towards the hips and it's tucked to fine leg for one
length delivery on the off stump, goes back and tucks it gently towards deep backward square leg in the gap for two
pushes at it and misses! Length delivery angled across the batsman, he pokes outside off and misses
touch fuller and he pushes it down towards mid-off for one
short of length on off, Dilshan doesn't move much and defends it back
nasty bouncer towards the batsman, he ducks and sways out just in time. The keeper does well to leap to his left with his right hand to stop it
bit of flight and turn outside off, pushed into the covers for one
flatter and shorter on off, Dilshan goes back and helps it to point after the turn
full on the stumps, pushed down the ground, Yasir dives to his left full length and pounces on that with his left hand
flighted a bit more outside off, driven down to long off for one
more towards middle and leg, pushes it gently to long on for one
touch shorter on off, steered towards deep cover for one off the back foot
pretty wide outside off, Dilshan swings his arms and misses. Just inside the wide line when it passed Dilshan
Rahat does it again to get the settled batsman! It was angling across Dilshan from back of length, he played along the wrong line and got an inside edge onto his middle stump. Bowled'im!
back of length on the off stump, defends it down to mid-on
touch wider, on back of length again, and he guides it to point this time
on length now just outside off, he leans forward and defends
full on the pads, clipped to deep square leg for one
turning in from outside off, he defends it back
takes a step down this time to take it on the full and pushes it to long on for one

oh, what a horrible mix up, Mathews is stranded on the middle of the pitch, doesn't even try to go back! He pushed the length delivery from off into the covers and took off for the single, Thirimanne said no, but only after a couple of steps by when Mathews was halfway down the pitch. Babar Azam comes forward and throws it flat and back to the keeper for some easy work. Pakistan back in the game?
leans forward to defend the ball into the covers
googly comes in towards middle stump, he stays back and blocks carefully
watches the ball turn a bit from leg stump and blocks it back
bit of movement towards off stump, Thirimanne tucks it with the angle wide of midwicket in the gap for two

that's a stunner from Anwar Ali, one more for Rahat! Short ball with room outside off, Thirimanne swung his bat but sent the ball flying towards third man and Anwar replied by running in and flying to his left to grab the ball with both hands!
wide on the off side as it moves away from back of length, called wide
off the glove and just wide of the keeper down leg for four! Short ball angled in to make the batsman uncomfortable, he tried to work it off the pads but gloved it fine
fullish outside off and it's stopped at point after a drive off the front foot
back of length outside off, stays back to help it to point
on middle and leg, worked off the pads to deep square leg for one
short ball outside off, slices it off the back foot to deep cover

loud loud loud appeal for lbw, given not out, they don't review it. Yasir bowled from wide of the crease and the ball struck the front pad on the front foot just around off and was turning a long way. Hawkeye shows umpire's call for impact and was turning down leg
cuts the ball late from outside off to third man for two
bit towards leg now and he helps it along the way to fine leg now for two leg byes
beaten outside off! Ripper it was as it was quicker outside off with turn, he went back to defend and the ball nearly got the outside edge
touch fuller and he pushes it down to mid-on
just back of length outside off with the angle, Chandimal goes on his toes quickly to tap it to third man
swing and a miss! Pretty wide outside off from good length, he chased without any footwork and missed
angled the bouncer in at 134kph and he ducks under it
bit too short and he stays back to smack it to the midwicket boundary from the middle of the bat for a cracking four!
cuts off the back foot and Rizwan throws himself to his left at point to save four for sure
back of length and angling in towards off stump, he defends off the back foot
bit of flight on middle and leg, tucked to midwicket and Rizwan gets a hand to it with a dive to his right but can't stop it to save the single
length delivery just outside off, he leans forward and blocks
on the pads this time and steered to square leg for one
flight and drift towards off stump, driven with the spin to deep midwicket
quicker one on middle and leg, Siriwardana gets his bat down just in time and gets a thick edge behind squre on leg
presses forward and blocks the length ball back
angles it in towards off, he defends off the back foot
swing and a miss as Siriwardana goes after the length ball well outside off, doesn't move his feet and is beaten
inside edge nearly hits the stumps! Short of length ball, Siriwardana wanted to pull half-heartedly and got an inside edge which the keeper stop with a dive to his right
pushes the full delivery this time down to mid on. A bit of yes and no and they decide against it quickly
shortish outside off, he taps it down wide of third man in the gap. Will it go for four, no it won't because Anwar slides to his left to save two. Excellent fielding
he's placed that in the gap by pulling the short ball in the air between midwicket and deep midwicket, the ball lands well before Shoaib Malik and he misfields too

loud appeal for caught behind down the leg side, keeper and bowler both appeal loudly but decide against the review after it's called not out. Chandimal smiles as it's not given a wide either after he swept that one
sharp turn towards the leg side as he defends it back
goes back and punches the ball to cover
loud lbw appeal this time as Chandimal sweeps with the turn again, the ball pitched around off and hit the pad in front of off and middle but maybe got some glove too
comes down the track and whips that against the turn to the midwicket boundary, by taking it on the full, for four
sliding towards the leg side after it hits him around leg
bit of movement outside off with the angle, guides the short of length ball to third man
short ball on off, he lofts it with a pull in the gap wide of deep square leg for two. Clever batting
yorker right on the off stump, blocked on the leg side and he wants a run but Irfan gets to it immediately
144.7kph, the short ball is too quick, he manages to just pull it towards square leg for one
bangs in the bouncer over the batsman's head and it's called a wide
cuts the short ball nicely off the back foot wide of backward point but Shoaib runs hard from deep point to dive and keep the ball in, excellent effort
taps the back of length ball straight to backward point
flighted down the leg side, Milinda isn't able to glance it away

pinned in front! Milinda goes back when he shouldn't have. To make matters worse, this one doesn't turn. Keeps going on with the arm. The batsman was set up to play with the turn, but there is none on offer. The ball just hurries on, strikes him low on the pads and is plumb in front
tossed up on off stump, driven to long-off
flighted on off stump, Chandimal steps forward to block
closes the bat face as he takes a length ball and tucks it to short midwicket
flighted outside off, turned down to long-on
fuller delivery on off stump, driven to mid-off for a quick single
waft and miss outside off. A little too much zip on the good length ball outside off for Pathirana
back of a length on off stump, defended
short and wide outside off, crashed to deep third man
short and wide outside off, hammered to the sweeper
back of a length on off stump, kept out
flighted and full outside off, driven down to long-on for one
driven down the ground to long on against the turn for one
goes back in the crease and works the ball to long on for one
flighted on middle, he comes down and pushes it back
stays back for it turn and cuts it dangerously to backward point

loud appeal for lbw from Hafeez mainly as the ball slid in instead of turning away. Pathirana stuck his bat out and helped the ball to point. Hafeez thought it hit the pad, and most probably it was outside off
drives on off and gets an inside edge onto his back pad after the ball seamed in
bouncer over the bowler as he ducks under it, not a wide
stays on the back foot and clips the ball to deep midwicket
tucks the ball off the back foot to midwicket

put down, but a tough chance! He pulled that short ball with some power to the leg side, Hafeez leapt at midwicket, got his hands to it but the ball didn't stick and ballooned for a bit towards mid-on
shot and flat towards middle, clipped to midwicket for one
short outside off, he goes back, wait and cuts it late and delicately to guide it to the third-man boundary for four!
presses forward and blocks the incoming delivery in front of middle stump
comes down the track and lofts that ball on the leg side, but it's wide of long-on. Irfan was also not quick to get to that
defends the length delivery from leg, back to the bowler
loud loud appeal for lbw as this one slides in instead of tuning away, he's trapped on the back foot and the umpire says no. Probably going down leg
short ball outside off and he opens up on the back foot to pull that over the in field on the leg side. Good nerves on debut from Pathirana
122kph, slower delivery on back of length on leg, tucked towards short fine leg and the keeper runs to it too, to keep them to one
angled into the pads, he fails to put it away
full on the pads, flicked wide of midwicket in the deep for one

dropped, another tough chance put down, this one the toughest today! Pathirana chipped this short of length ball without much power on the off side, Babar Azam leapt to his left to catch with both hands but the ball didn't stick. Oh, Pakistan!
clips this incoming delivery to midwicket
leg-stump line from Yasir and he tucks the ball to short fine leg
full and down leg, goes past the attempted paddle for a wide
just past cover, for four! This googly was pitched up outside off, he lofted that over the covers and just cleared the fielder in the circle
turns it in sharply this time, he can't put it away
what a shot from Pathirana! It was pitched up and he lofted it down the ground without a full swing and that sailed over long-off for six. Fielder in the circle
goes back now and helps the ball with the turn towards backward square leg for one
flighted and full outside off, driven straight to cover
errs down the leg side for a wide across the batsman
waits for the length delivery and defends the ball on off
touch shorter outside off, he helps it to third man and they come back for the second. Chandimal wasn't running that hard and somehow made it back in time
short ball towards the batsman, he pulls that square of the wicket for one
angles the ball across, Chandimal pulls across the line and misses
short ball on the leg side and he helps it nicely down the leg side, fine enough to beat fine leg for a four
take that! Pitched up well outside off, there's lot of room and he crashes that through the covers by going down on a knee for four
he dances down the track again, nearly takes it on the full and lofts it against the turn to the long-on boundary for a one-bounce four
presses forward to defend the ball to leg

he's given it away, charges down again and misses the ball completely to be stumped, doesn't even look back. The ball was outside off this time, he swung his arms and was beaten outside off and Sarfraz did the rest
leans forward and blocks the ball on off
gets the outside edge by drawing him forward, thick edge fell just short of first slip and Shoaib ran a long way to keep the ball in at third man boundary
turning in and it's helped to deep midwicket for one
angles the ball across and Chandimal helps the ball to third man
did he expect the short ball? It's a yorker on the stumps and he blocks it on leg
it's a bouncer this time and he ducks under it

chips it back over the bowler's head, he didn't time it but kind of whipped it back from the off stump, to just beat the mid-off fielder too before he ran back to slide and keep the ball in. The two batsman run hard to make it three
140.9 kph, quick short ball outside off, Chandimal stays back and takes it on the glove for a quick single
bangs in another bouncer with the angle and he ducks under it
fullish on the stumps, driven down easily to long on for one
fullish on the pads and it's clipped to backward square leg for one
goes across to steer the ball with the turn past midwicket for one more
pushes the ball gingerly down to long off for one
full on the off stump, pushed back to the bowler
full again, this one is worked down to long on for one
angled across outside off, runs it down to third man for one
140kph, yorker right on the stumps and he digs it out, down to mid on for one
towards the pads and he steers it to fine leg for one
full on the stumps, looking for the yorker, and he whips it to mid on
131kph, that looked like a quick bouncer as it angled in, Thisara moved out of the way right at the end and Sarfraz did very well to leap and pouch it with one hand
coming in with the angle and he works it to fine leg for one
length delivery outside off, pushed on the off side
goes back and turns the ball from off towards midwicket for one
turning in towards middle and leg, helped to midwicket
more towards the leg side and he tucks to short fine leg this time
on the pads again, pushed wide of midwicket for one
pushes the length delivery into the covers
outside off, he swings for a cut and gets an edge just wide of the keeper for four. No slip in place
fullish on middle and leg, pushed back to the bowler
short of length on the leg side and it's tucked off the hips behind square on leg
almost a yorker, it's clipped to deep midwicket for one
touch back of length outside off, chops it towards cover point for a quick single
bangs in the bouncer and Thisara ducks under it easily
fullish on the stumps, pushed back to the bowler
some turning towards the off stump, he goes back and cuts it to deep point
goes back and steers the ball against the spin to leg for one
short and wide outside off, crashed off the back foot and Hafeez does very well with his slide to the right from deep point to save three
length delivery outside off, he goes back and turns it to leg for one
turning in from outside off, he cuts off the back foot for one more
inside edge onto the pad after a forward lean on the off side
stays back this time and guides the back of length ball to point
on length outside off again, runs this down to third man for one
fullish on the stumps, clipped to square leg
bouncer on the off side, he ducks under it and it's called a wide
pushes the ball to point and calls for a quick signle
not too far outside off, he guides it wide of third man and they run very quickly to come back for the second

he's given a catch on the off side! He looked to turn the ball to leg but closed his bat too early and a thick edge ballooned towards point, Shoaib went to his right from cover point and put in a dive to put his fingers under that one
straight ball on the off stump, he blocks it back
swings and misses! It was well outside off, Malinga threw in his bat horizontally and nearly got an outside edge
slow and full offcutter on the stumps, Malinga defends carefully on the leg side
straight on the stumps again, Malinga doesn't move much and defends on the leg side

fuller on the stumps and Malinga flicks it away, past midwicket and mid-on, they want two, Yasir slides after running from mid-on and twists his ankle while getting up from the slide, unable to throw the ball back
it's done rather easily, Chanidmal clips the ball off his hips to fine leg and seals it with a single
